RESULT.summary: Our Just FreshDirect full-bodied cheddar comes courtesy of Grafton Village Cheese in Vermont.
RESULT.description: Grafton's cheese-making traditions date back more than a century, and their experience shows with this well-balanced, creamy cheddar. Made from the milk of local dairy cows and unpasteurized to create a complex, nuanced flavor, this is the product of passionate artisans who understand the subtleties of cheese-making. Aged for one year, this young cheddar has a mild flavor and soft texture that blends easily into your favorite dish. For a special treat, try pairing it with a Riesling or Chardonnay for a delectable combination that will bring out the complexities of both flavors.
